stockmarket.model

Class SQLPortfolioModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • mvp.core.AbstractPropertyModel
      • stockmarket.model.PortfolioModel
        • stockmarket.model.SQLPortfolioModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Portfolio

    @ThreadSafe
public class SQLPortfolioModel
extends PortfolioModel
    An extension of the standard PortfolioModel to integrate a field for a SQL userid primary key. This value is used when loading and saving this model from the database.

    THREAD SAFETY: The additions to this class are completely thread safe. Consult the superclass documentation for details on its synchronization policy.

    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    craig
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • SQLPortfolioModel

        public SQLPortfolioModel()

    • Method Detail

      • setUserID

        public void setUserID(int userID)
        Sets the SQL userid for this portfolio. This is not a bound property, and is only necessary for saving and loading this portfolio from the database. Because this value is essential to saving the state of this portfolio, it should always match a value in the database.
        Parameters:
        userID - the SQL userid for this portfolio.

      • getUserID

        public int getUserID()
        Returns the SQL userid for saving and loading this portfolio's state
        Returns:
        the SQL userid.
